</gmd:presentationForm>             </gmd:CI_Citation>          </gmd:citation>          <gmd:abstract>             <gco:CharacterString>The NCDC U.S. National Overview was first presented in 1998 as part of the State of the Climate Report. It is a framework that summarizes U.S. National observations of surface temperature and precipitation data by placing the data into historical perspective. The U.S. National Overview provides access to monthly, 3-month/seasonal, 6-month, 12-month and annual climate summaries by state, division and region. Topics include: Surface Temperature (rankings maps and time series), Precipitation (rankings maps and time series), Percent Area wet/dry cold/warm, and Primary Crop Region Maps with Season-to-Date Precipitation Time series. Additional information on current seasonal summaries for snow, fire, severe weather, and Atlantic and Pacific hurricanes, is also provided.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:abstract>            <gco:CharacterString>Entity and Attribute Overview: The U.S. National Overview contains monthly, 3-month/seasonal, 6-month, 12-month and annual climate summaries by state, division and region. Topics include: Surface Temperature (rankings maps and time series), Precipitation (rankings maps and time series), Percent Area wet/dry cold/warm, and Primary Crop Region Maps with Season-to-Date Precipitation Time series.          <gmd:evaluationMethodDescription>                   <gco:CharacterString>All of the temperature and precipitation ranks and values are based on preliminary, near real-time data. The ranks will change when the final data are processed, but the ranks are not replaced on the U.S. National Overview web pages. National rankings based on final quality-controlled data are provided on the Climate Monitoring Products web page and the Climate at a Glance web page as they become available (http://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/oa/climate/research/cag3/cag3.html).</gco:CharacterString>                </gmd:evaluationMethodDescription>                <gmd:result gco:nilReason="unknown"/>             </gmd:DQ_CompletenessCommission>          </gmd:report>          <gmd:report>             <gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency>                <gmd:measureDescription>                   <gco:CharacterString>U.S. climate data for the region and period of interest were compared with all other such data in the available period of record.</gco:CharacterString>                </gmd:measureDescription>                <gmd:result gco:nilReason="unknown"/>             </gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency>          </gmd:report>          <gmd:lineage>             <gmd:LI_Lineage>                <gmd:processStep>                   <gmi:LE_ProcessStep>                      <gmd:description>                         <gco:CharacterString>The Climate Monitoring Branch at NCDC compiles the monthly U.S. National Overview by analyzing regional, state, divisional, and station weather and climate data that are provided by the Regional Climate Centers, NCDC and other available sources.
